data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Andres Perea for Orlando gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the away team in Orlando.
Antonio Carlos (Orlando) has received a yellow card from Silviu Petrescu.
Jesus Medina is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 4, New York Cityâ€™s Jesus Medina is on his feet again at Exploria Stadium.
Chris Mueller (Orlando) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for New York City at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 5, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York City's Alexander Ring has been booked in Orlando.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of New York City.
In the minute 7, Orlando to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 10, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Orlando.
Daryl Dike for the home team is judged to be offside.
Silviu Petrescu awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
In Orlando, Daryl Dike (Orlando) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 14, Silviu Petrescu awards New York City a goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu signals a New York City throw-in in Orlando's half.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Chris Mueller scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Ruan to set up the goal.
In the minute 19, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Orlando's Ruan misses with an attempt on goal.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 21, Orlando are caught offside.
Orlando to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Free kick for New York City in the half of Orlando.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Orlando.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
In the minute 25, Valentin Castellanos for New York City drives towards goal at Exploria Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
New York City's Jesus Medina gets in a shot on goal at Exploria Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Free kick New York City.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
In the minute 32, Silviu Petrescu blows against Orlando's Daryl Dike for offside.
In Orlando, Gudmundur Thorarinsson of New York City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
New York City push forward at Exploria Stadium and Gudmundur Thorarinsson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Orlando defence.
In the minute 35, Orlando needs to be cautious. New York City have an attacking throw-in.
New York City's Gudmundur Thorarinsson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Orlando have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 37, Robin Jansson is booked for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
Orlando are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 39, Orlando's Robin Jansson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a New York City defender.
Silviu Petrescu signals a New York City throw-in in Orlando's half.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of New York City.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Keaton Parks levels the score at 1-1.
Valentin Castellanos of New York City is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Free kick for New York City in the half of Orlando.
The 1st half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
Silviu Petrescu awards Orlando a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Nani for Orlando is whistled offside.
Corner awarded to New York City.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Orlando.
Free kick Orlando.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 45, Anton Tinnerholm (New York City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half has started.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 47, Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Throw-in Orlando.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 48, Silviu Petrescu awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for New York City at Exploria Stadium.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
In the minute 52, New York City have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
New York City's Maxime Chanot attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 53, Orlando have a goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to New York City.
At Exploria Stadium, Kamal Miller has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 54, Keaton Parks is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Keaton Parks returns to the field for New York City after picking up a slight injury.
Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of New York City.
Throw-in for New York City close to the penalty box.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Orlando to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 60, Silviu Petrescu signals a Orlando throw-in in New York City's half.
Free kick Orlando.
Nani of Orlando smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Orlando in the half of New York City.
Orlando are coming forward and Kamal Miller gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
In the minute 63, New York City pushes forward through Alexander Ring, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to New York City.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
In the minute 64, Valentin Castellanos (New York City) strikes at Exploria Stadium but his header is cleared.
Corner awarded to New York City.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Orlando in the half of New York City.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of New York City.
Throw-in New York City.
In the minute 68, Free kick for New York City in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Orlando.
In the minute 71, Orlando to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Ronny Deila (New York City) is making a first substitution, with Ismael Tajouri replacing Gary Mackay Steven.
New York City push upfield but Silviu Petrescu quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 74, Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Throw-in for New York City at Exploria Stadium.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 76, David Loera is replacing Joey Dezart for the home team.
Free kick Orlando.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Keaton Parks (New York City) gets a yellow card.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 84, Robinho is on a sub for Chris Mueller for Orlando.
Silviu Petrescu awards the home team a throw-in.
Silviu Petrescu signals a New York City throw-in in Orlando's half.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Alexander Callens.
In the minute 89, New York City's Alexander Callens looks ok and returns to the pitch.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Silviu Petrescu awards Orlando a goal kick.
Nani has recovered and rejoins the match in Orlando.
Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
Throw-in for New York City at Exploria Stadium.
In Orlando New York City attack through Ismael Tajouri. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
New York City to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Free kick Orlando.
Silviu Petrescu blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Ronny Deila is making the team's second substitution at Exploria Stadium with Nicolas Acevedo replacing Keaton Parks.
Alexander Callens, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Sebastien Ibeagha is the substitute for New York City.
New York City make their fourth substitution with Tony Rocha replacing Jesus Medina.
The home team have replaced Daryl Dike with Jordan Bender. This is the third substitution made today by Oscar Pareja.
The home team replace Ruan with Alex De John.
Nani is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
